attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.title: Not happy at all 😤
attributes.review: I submitted my number and I was left with spam from China, this app must be selling my information to China. Donald J. Trump has no concern for the public safety, unless your a white racist, this may sound like fake news to you if you support him but if you believe Trumps perverted lying self, why wouldn’t you believe a innocent person like my self.

attributes.title: Interface is boring and slow
attributes.review: Listen - I am a die hard republican who downloaded this app to get away from the FAKE NEWS MAINSTREAM MEDIA! However, it’s hard to believe that my lord and savior President Donald John Trump represents his brand through this terrible app. There is not enough red white and blue, and the pages move slower than SLEEPY JOE BIDEN!!!!! I will be telling my fellow WASPs to delete this app !!!!!

attributes.title: disgusting

attributes.title: no good
attributes.review: This app is ridiculous. There’s so many glitches and my phone keeps crashing. I wasn’t able to see Trumps plans for our country. Even though they were probably bad. DO NOT GET THIS APP. It’s a waste of your time and doesn’t help at all if it kicks you out, glitches and crashes your phone.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER🤮🤢
attributes.review: So I downloaded this to support my president but then IMMEDIATELY after my boyfriend dumped me, I lost my job,and I started balding ! Also my house caught on fire due to this horrible app. My WiFi router is REFUSING to work Bc I’m convinced there is a serious bug on this app. This app is just plain TERRIBLE. It was a disaster never again will I download such a thing ugh. Delete this app !!!

attributes.title: Glitch
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay up to date on the political events so I could be an informed voter. But when I got the app it completely messed up my phone. My battery is running low and every time I open it it just closes the app immediately. I’m sad that this app couldn’t have been more.

attributes.title: Trump has small wiener energy
attributes.review: This app spiked my blood pressure, led me to cardiac arrest, and I almost died. My phone kept glitching and crashing, and my whole screen turned orange because I saw this orange guy who I’ve heard is the most narcissistic, racist, fascist, bigoted, fatheaded, poopy butthole human being to walk the planet. How dare you allow such an awful app stay put. Shame on Apple.
